Subject: [ANN] Release 1.2.0
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281
X-Yahoo-Profile: stackarchiveorg

We just made the 1.2.0 release.  1.2.0 has IP-based politeness, 
configurable URI-canonicalization, and mid-fetch abort.  It also has 
lots of Bug fixes. See the Heritrix Release Notes, 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes.html, for detail and 
Known Limitations (In particular, https fetching requires SUN JDK and UI 
throws OOME if jobs run in series).
Yours,
St.Ack
